      • createNewCustomer

        public static void createNewCustomer(long personID,
                                     long storeID,
                                     java.lang.String fullName,
                                     java.lang.String phoneNumber,
                                     Customer.PayType payMethod,
                                     float accountBalance,
                                     java.lang.String creditCardNumber,
                                     boolean accountStatus,
                                     java.util.Calendar expirationDate,
                                     Client client)
        Creates new customer and adds to database
        Parameters:
        personID - customer's person ID
        storeID - the store the customer belongs to
        fullName - customer's first and last names
        phoneNumber - customer's active phone number
        payMethod - payment method
        accountBalance - customer's account balance in the store
        creditCardNumber - customer's credit card number
        accountStatus - the account status if blocked or not
        expirationDate - the subscription expiration Date
        client - currently running client

        Parameters:

        formerPersonID - - old person ID (in case it has been changed)
        client - - currently running client

      • calcCustomerRefund

        public static float calcCustomerRefund(java.util.Calendar requiredDate)
        Calculates how much to refund the customer for his canceled order
        Parameters:
        requiredDate - - order's required Date
        Returns:
        how much of the original price to refund the customer (0.0f, 0.5f , 1.0f)
